instruction: Count files by extension in /var/www

output.action: find /var/www -type f -printf %f\n | grep -o \.[^.]*$ | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn

instruction: Count files by extension and show total size per type in /var/www/html

output.action: find /var/www/html -type f -name *.* -printf %f\n | grep -o \.[^.]*$ | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn
